tags: Value for money,
review:
I have been a loyal Patient for Dr Voras Clinic and also advised many of my friends and relatives to visit Dr Voras Denatl Clinic.
Yesterday I had a minor work of my Denatl metal cap which got Displaced which need only Repasting of cap via Gum.(Dental Gum).
I was charged 1000 Rs , which is very Exorbitant.** ******** **** ***** ****** **** ********* ** ***** **** **** ** ***** ** *** ** *** ********* *** **** * ******* ******Request you should not be charging 1000 for **** sticking Dental implant for which cost ** * ***** of Glue is 1000.
Such Exorbitant charges are not at all excepted in Post covid situation. 
**** ***** ********** ****** *** ***** **** ** ******* ****** ****** ** ****** ** *** one would definitely think of not referring any other Patient to Dr Voras Dental Clinic.******** ********************
